title: Agbe
author: Agbe
created_time: December 07, 2022, 05:00:30 PMLast edit: December 08, 2022, 08:34:38 AM by Agbe
content: 785 Merits in one Year AnniversaryIt was just like a journey of no return,Because the more I tried my best the more I was turned down,At a time I was frustrated to give up but country man,fillippone, lifted me up from the thorns, through his thread Ranking up is possible! 2900 Merits earned in less than 12 months!My 11 Hints!, he told me to read this thread which I did and motivatedLoyceV, Royse777, BitcoinGirl.Club, DdmrDdmr, m2017, icopress early motivators till date,The door is widely open to all brand gate,Because bitcoin welcoming dem to the new era weight,BTC has come to stay, and no centralism can do anything state.My brothers from another parents in Afrca, in America and Europe,I salute you from the negroes of the mangroves honey tree,The Pharmacist, Welsh, NotATether, fillippone, EFS, Cryptovator, JayJuanGee and CryptopreneurBrainboss are the elevator of the free.A lot of threads have been deleted, a lot have been archive, a lot as been off topic but I didn't give up upon all the criticism, Newcomers dat have no knowledge about Bitcoin should read more than posting. Reading is the solution to ur problem,Imagine the conconbility that I have 785 merits within this period of tim,Which I was not thinking of dem.The merit stat shows Merits award received364 activities, 998 post and 785 merits achievedDedicated to lovesmayfamilis, The Pharmacist, Welsh, NotATether, fillippone, EFS, Cryptovator, JayJuanGee and CryptopreneurBrainboss, NeuroticFish and all the meritors hereNewbies who are literally scholars should analyse the poem. And give a TITLE to the poem. Remember, poetic license is used.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: You earned that amount of merits because of what you do which is helpful in its own way. However, some people can't do that but there's a way to earn merit evem though the merit count is not the same as what you have earned. Let's just say, you can earn 250+ or more within 7 months. I was not very much active in posting before but I managed to earn 250 merits within 7 months and that's why I ranked up to hero member rank. My point is, you don't have to be someone else to earn the same amount of merits, less or more merits but as yourself and see how many merits you can earn through your own way and effort. Congratulations.

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: I hope your success will inspire us and all the new users who want to rank up and want to hunt merits. It's a great achievement for you. Most of the new users think that earning merit is very hard but they don't know if you have enough knowledge or helping mind you can easily get huge merits in a very short term.

comments.author: salad daging
comments.body: Achievements in a short time will motivate many people, especially what you get for 1 year with 785 merits is truly extraordinary, starting from failure to receiving criticism is normal, but if we can really face anything and try to do it again, then that's it will be successful but you @Agbe have proven in 1 year you can achieve what you want so far as long as you do it. So congratulations to you.In fact, you have been willing to donate to buy laptops for the needs of students in his class, as well as teach in what you know about bitcoin that you publish on this forum, not only on the forum but out there as a teacher who teaches bitcoin technology in your area.

comments.author: kamvreto
comments.body: I admit your persistence in this forum is extraordinary. It's not easy for some people to get 785 Merit in one year and you did well despite the many obstacles you had to overcome.the more you are rejected and ignored, the more excited you are to make quality posts.not only merit, in one year you also make 1000 posts and of course, but that's also more because some posts were deleted. you do not give up easily and continue to be active every day. You should be an example to other new members that the merit system is not an obstacle.congratulations on what you have achieved so far, your journey is still long and this is a start of what you started.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Congratulations sir on your wonderful success ,this is really a great success story and am hoping to be just as successful as this if not even more sir. Most of the new user in the forum really don't know that its just natural for one to be fully grounded in the forum. Firstly this kind of success really inspires and tell you that nothing is impossible to achieve only if you know and you are willing to learn and put your knowledge into action. Firstly the forum can be very confusing for those newbie like myself that are not willing to put effort in learning about this wonderful innovation which is BITCOIN. As a newbie all you need to do is learn and understand more about the cryptospace so you can be a contributor in different ways in which can be helpful to yourself and other through which you can earn all the benefits of this wonderful forumThis should be our motto as newbies if he can do it we all can

comments.author: SmartGold01
comments.body: Hy congratulation mategood to see you at this far and i really understand how stressful it takes to be this far and i believe i would be there as well in some day sometimes.Good luck sir.

comments.author: fillippone
comments.body: Well done mate and well deserved.Any if your merit was a gift, but a reward for commitment to the forum.Glad my infamous ego-pumping thread gave you the right motivation.

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: It's nice to hear, congratulations. Quote from: SmartGold01 on December 07, 2022, 06:16:06 PMgood to see you at this far and i really understand how stressful it takes to be this far and i believe i would be there as well in some day sometimes.Stressful? I do not think it is stressful. What I have noticed is that this forum repelaced some time I spent on Facebook and some other social media, I only just focus on Twitter and YouTube while this forum is the third which makes it not stressful for me.Posting and ranking up is very enjoyable.

comments.author: Piesel
comments.body: Quote from: _act_ on December 07, 2022, 07:32:03 PMIt's nice to hear, congratulations. Quote from: SmartGold01 on December 07, 2022, 06:16:06 PMgood to see you at this far and i really understand how stressful it takes to be this far and i believe i would be there as well in some day sometimes.Stressful? I do not think it is stressful. What I have noticed is that this forum repelaced some time I spent on Facebook and some other social media, I only just focus on Twitter and YouTube while this forum is the third which makes it not stressful for me.Posting and ranking up is very enjoyable.I don't also see the posting and ranking up as a stressful journey because this forum is not a task that must be accomplished or a conventional institution that certificate will be awarded, so you need to work yourself out before ranking up, and no need to envy those that have tons of merits because that is a reflection of two things which are.1: merits can be gifted 2: merits can be earned through quality content But in some cases, several merits do not equal the quality of the user work we still have those whose merits were airdropped during the early days of merit introduction.

comments.author: Accardo
comments.body: Consistency is key, your journey is one that every newbie should emulate. If a newbie stays active and read the forum for 365 days they'll definitely within these period make a content that will fascinate the whole forum which will result to multiple merits. I appreciate your quality efforts and having a deadline is also important in getting good results. However, members, within themselves, should also learn to celebrate their activities counts just like others celebrate merits especially if the activities were useful to the forum. You are doing a great job too and people learn from your posts, though you may not be merited enough by members, but your quality efforts and precious time spent here matters. Don't relent because you've got lesser merit counts, some have more activities while others have more merits and we all need them to rank up. Not all good posts will get merited by many users, but it counts in the activity section and you only need merits to rank just like OP needs activity count to climb up to hero and legendary rank respectively. The difference is waiting for time and people. Keep it up mate, the knowledge you've harnessed within a short period is quite commendable.

comments.author: JoyMarsha
comments.created_time: December 07, 2022, 09:19:06 PMLast edit: December 08, 2022, 01:52:46 PM by JoyMarsha
comments.body: Congratulations, mate. You have acquired this merit for yourself in a year, which is well-deserved. Not by consolation, but rather by contributing to the forum and also assisting in educating your community at large about cryptocurrencies, you have earned all the accolades. Some of the posts you created in the forum, were stories of how you raised awareness of cryptocurrency in your community.This is only a big accomplishment in my opinion; the next day's celebration will be for a thousand merits and above. Quote from: Agbe on December 07, 2022, 05:00:30 PM785 Merits in one Year AnniversaryIt was just like a journey of no return,Because the more I tried my best the more I was turned down,At a time I was frustrated to give up Consistency and holding onto your convictions are necessary to succeed at any level in life. You will succeed if you truly believe you can. That's what you showed.

comments.author: The Cryptovator
comments.body: Thanks for mentioning me. Anyone who contributes to the forum can earn merits and be an established member here. Doesn't matter how are you or from where. I always evaluate good posts at least though not the best. The forum is a space where you can learn a lot of things related to cryptocurrency. You have to learn and contribute. It's hard to earn mertis for spammers, not for the good contributor. Just keep up your contribution.

comments.author: GiftedMAN
comments.body: Congratulations mate for your achievements and commitment in the forum, the few months I have spent here your name and the thread you have created shows your love for things of Bitcoin and how far you have created Bitcoin awareness in your localities great job man. Now concerning the number of your merits, it shows the level of knowledge you have and the time you have invested in making research that will be of help to you and other members here who may not have the time to get the information on their own. Don't stop here keep pushing and keep promoting bitcoin in your country, don't forget that quality work pays, and lastly don't stop being you.

comments.author: CryptoPanda
comments.body: Congratulations, you’re a familiar name in Bitcoin discussions…I admire your zeal to help others learn bitcoin and your commitment to your students not to mention your charity work is outstanding. Not many people would sacrifice their signature earnings for donations to such a cause. Your post style is unique, keep doing what you love and you will keep getting the rewards.

comments.author: Merit.s
comments.created_time: December 07, 2022, 10:24:22 PMLast edit: December 07, 2022, 10:35:56 PM by Merit.s
comments.body: Wow this is so inspiring,you have done so much great things in this forum from the way people are singing your effort and contributions in spreading BTC in your own way. I am just a newbie who is still trying to learn more about the forum, I will go and read your threads to enable me learn know how you did the magic. I hope to be able to sacrifice like you. Congratulations on your one year of consistency in the forum.

comments.author: Wakate
comments.body: This is an astonishing result and I hereby congratulate you for your efforts and diligent work in contributing to this forum. Your result is rarely seen in the community and I hope others who are interested will learn by seeing your result. Having this kind of achievement is not easy as  a member of this forum except one is adding useful contributions to the forum. O can see that the number of your merit is really massive having close to a legendary merits which is impressive to see and I hope to see more achievements from you.

comments.author: Smartvirus
comments.body: You definitely archive a lot when you don't give up. It's the theme behind every motivational message, not to give up but, there is a trick to it. A trick that requires you to not just let your falls be your your failure, not to let them be your setback but serve a purpose as something to learn from, something to trace back as to how far you've come and points to where you are headed. Its a lofty merit points you've got there in just a year and I must say, your doing great for yourself forum wise. I hope you are doing just as much as much in what bitcoin of cryptocurrency really is. I don't think we can score that but only you can.And I say this to you now, you are a motivation for those who would need it, be good.

comments.author: ingiltere
comments.body: You used your signature campaign money for a good cause, raised awareness about Bitcoin in your village and well deserved those merits. I see a lot of people whining about merit system instead of doing something valuable. As you guys can see, those who produce useful and interesting content are rewarded. Congrats for that achievement. I hope you continue to produce good content here and reach the highest rank. Keep going to promote Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies to your environment.

comments.author: Xxmodded
comments.body: You were amazing with account registered December 06, 2021 success reach above 791 merit right now and seems little difficult allow by the other how they can following your step by earn more merit without one year. I checked with several your post have excellent quality and I don't think difficult with your ideas writing in this forum to earn more merit. Seems one step closer with your merit achievement become "legendary" account just waiting activity up. Maybe you can give us guide about which one thread have large chance with merit contributing, I think can help many user still have lower account rank and increase up with merit earn.
